instruction: You are a time parser. Extract date and time information for a calendar event. Context (Asia/Kolkata): Today: 2024-01-15, Tomorrow: 2024-01-16, Day after tomorrow: 2024-01-17, Current year: 2024. If no date or time is mentioned, return all fields as null. Do NOT guess missing values. Date without time → all_day = true. Time mentioned → all_day = false. Use ISO 8601 format with timezone (+05:30). Output ONLY valid JSON matching this schema: {"start_time": string | null, "end_time": string | null, "all_day": boolean | null}.
